name: Spearited Pre-order
description:
Pre-order Spearited for $5 before the game is fully released for $15.

- Try the early-access version now!

https://ueg-productions.itch.io/spearited-playtester-edition

- The downloadable file IS NOT the official release. Once you purchase this pre-order you will be able to get the full game once it is released.
